div.span: for campus specific online learning resources!

b.font: *** Please note the Districts Board of Trustees will be considering postponing or taking other actions relating to the May 2, 2020 Bond Election this Thursday, April 16th at its scheduled Board Meeting.
Notice of Postponement of Bond Election

p.strong: ATTENTION: Dear Brooks County ISD Parents, Students, Stakeholders, and Community,

span.p: In light of the evolving conditions surrounding COVID-19, we continue to take proactive steps to protect the health and well-being of our students, families, staff, and Brooks County community. After careful deliberation with Brooks County Emergency Team, Brooks County ISD Administration and Instructional Leadership Team, we have made the decision to provide virtual and online learning and extend the suspension of normal campus operations through May 4, 2020.

p.strong: Click picture for full message from the superintendent.

br.p: Keep checking back as we continue to build a list of "Free Learning Resources" that your children will love doing at home during the coronavirus crisis!

div.span: Brooks County ISD to Provide FREE Curbside Meals to Children 18 and younger

div.p: Brooks County ISD Food Services will offer free curbside meals during the madated school closures. Grab & Go Meals will be available at EVERY bus stop starting at 10am. On Fridays meals will include Saturday and Sunday meals.
Also, meals can be picked up at the Falfurrias Junior High Cafeteria from 9:30am till 1pm each day.

div.span: We are a member of the Rural Schools Innovation Zone (RSIZ)!

div.p: The RSIZ is a partnership between three school districts Brooks County ISD, Freer ISD, and Premont ISD. The partnership includes 4 Academies.
Brooks County's Academy the Ignite Technical Institute, is located at Falfurrias High School. Our Academy is one of four exciting career pathways! .

span.span: Learn more about each RSIZ academy

div.p: Learn about your child's score on a secure site for parents and/or students to access a students state assessment scores for the STAAR, STAAR Alternate 2, and TELPAS programs. www.TexasAssessment.com

div.span: P-TECH (Pathways in Technology Early College High School)

div.p: The P-TECH at Falfurrias High School will enable our students to begin their college and professional lives more quickly and with more support. Graduates of P-TECH have the opportunity to earn an Applied Associate of Science degree and leave high school with the skills and knowledge they need in order to continue onto a four-year Bachelor's of Applied Science degree, or step seamlessly into competitive, high demand jobs.

div.p: February 20, 2020 Falfurrias High School Mariachi advances to the UIL State Marching Contest to be held at the the UTRGV Performing Arts Complex. Mariachi Azahar earned a 1st division at UIL Solo and Ensemble on February 6.
November 6, 2019 The Falfurrias High School Marching Band has the honor of competing at the 2019 UIL State Marching Championships at the Alamodome in San Antonio, Texas.
March 2018- The FHS Boys Powerlifting Team are the 2018 Class 3A State Champions.
May 2018- Falfurrias High School State UIL Track & Field: 800 Meter Run, Gavin Martinez; 100 & 200 Meter Run, Jose Trevino; Shot Put, Marco Arevalo.
November 2017 Falfurrias High School: Marissa Martinez & Gavin Martinez qualified for the UIL State Cross Country Championships.
